name: Doodle Pinball - Exam Game
description:
The goal of the game is to get the highest score you can.

Note: UI became misaligned in the WebGL build at the last minute.

Controls:

Space: Hold to charge launcher,  release to fire ball

/: Right paddle

z: Left paddle

Esc: Pause menu (can view overall score and level score from here, too. Buttons to return to the game, or the main menu)

References:

Pencil image: https://www.shutterstock.com/image-photo/yellow-pencil-isolated-on-white-backgro...

Handwritten font: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Architects+Daughter
